```{r}
install.packages('tidyverse')
install.packages('sf')
install.packages('dplyr')
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
january_df <- read.csv('../data/yellow_tripdata_2019-01.csv')
map_nyc <- read_sf('../data/taxi_zones.shp')
```

```{r}
january_df <- january_df[january_df$passenger_count != 0,]

ggplot()+
  geom_sf(
    data= map_nyc
    )
```
